note.p: Daughter of Edward Lloyd and his wife Letitia Owen Lloyd. Married Herbert Watkin Williams-Wynn (1822–62) in 1855.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/1881/43/10)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1995 (Ancestry.com, accessed 10 October 2022)
London Church of England parish registers DL/T/090/015 (Ancestry.com, accessed 10 October 2022)
